Texts.Chs:
Living data constructs. Fragile in the physical realm, but nimble and dangerous.

  ^orange;食性^reset;: Does not eat.

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  +^green;15^reset;% 速度,  能量x^green;1.25^reset;
  ^green;When 50% or higher in energy, gain minor health regen^reset;
  Immunity: 窒息
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Ice, Cosmic and Shadow

^orange;武器^reset;:
  Assault Rifle/Dagger/Whipblade: 伤害 x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;2^reset;% 暴击几率
  Machine Pistol: 伤害 x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;25^reset;% 暴击伤害

^red;弱点^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Electric, -^red;25^reset;% Physical, -^red;20^reset;% Fire & Radiation
Texts.Eng:
Living data constructs. Fragile in the physical realm, but nimble and dangerous.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Does not eat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;15^reset;% Speed, Energy x^green;1.25^reset;
  ^green;When 50% or higher in energy, gain minor health regen^reset;
  Immunity: Oxygen
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Ice, Cosmic and Shadow

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Assault Rifle/Dagger/Whipblade: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance
  Machine Pistol: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;25^reset;% Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Electric, -^red;25^reset;% Physical, -^red;20^reset;% Fire & Radiation
